CustomField.formula: IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_340)) + 'servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file='& IF (Total_of_Activities__c > 0, '0156g000001GtsR', '0156g000001GtsS'),'',22,22) &""& IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_340)) + 'servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file='& IF (Total_of_Activities__c > 3, '0156g000001GtsR', '0156g000001GtsS'),'',22,22) &""& IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_340)) + 'servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file='& IF (Total_of_Activities__c > 6, '0156g000001GtsR', '0156g000001GtsS'),'',22,22) &""& IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_340)) + 'servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file='& IF (Total_of_Activities__c > 9, '0156g000001GtsR', '0156g000001GtsS'),'',22,22) &""& IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_340)) + 'servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file='& IF (Total_of_Activities__c > 12, '0156g000001GtsR', '0156g000001GtsS'),'',22,22)
CustomField.label: Activity Indicator
